product_name: Keen Rivington Ballerina CNX Shoes - Women's
long_description: Combining a slim, low-profile style with cushy support, the women's Keen Rivington Ballerina CNX shoes deliver superior comfort plus plenty of style to take you from work to dinner downtown. Full-grain leather uppers offer durable, flexible coverage; canvas linings are soft next to skin. Polyurethane midsoles with contoured arches and thermoplastic polyurethane support provide lasting comfort. Low-profile rubber outsoles on the Keen Rivington Ballerina CNX shoes give reliable traction on a variety of surfaces without being bulky.
short_description: Combining a slim, low-profile style with cushy support, the women's Keen Rivington Ballerina CNX shoes deliver superior comfort plus plenty of style to take you from work to dinner downtown.
